channel.title: Getpass
channel.description: can anyone give the a getpass command? or at least the base to one? i hate having to load p my vps jsut to get to char files :l it takes like an hour to load just the list of em... xD

item.title: Getpass
item.dc:creator: @blue_boy blue boy
item.description:
@blue_boy wrote:

[code=cpp] if(command.startsWith(“getpass”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Pewp”)))
{
String name = command.substring(8);
if(name.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
sendMessage(“Nice try fool! :D”);
}
else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is getting password of "+name);
getPass(name);
}

                    if(getPass(name) == 3)
                    sendMessage("Error.");
                    else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase("Admin"))
                    sendMessage("Player "+name+"'s pass successfully retrieved");

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/getpass.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Moparnarb/Desktop/Narb 4 Beta/logs/getpass.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
